thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1722
thread.title: Silviea

author: Silviea
title: Silviea
text: I was trying to book a flight with 3 legs and your site offered the fastest route at the best price with lots of options to tweak the search. At first, I tried the airline website and their best offer was a double overnight flight for the outbound, while on FlightHub I was able to book the same airline with same day flights and probably the best connections. Amazing!
